snippet: Conventional wisdom in Hollywood has been that when Howard Stringer departed as chief executive the pictures group might be put up for sale, a theory that Sony has denied.
abstract: Conventional wisdom in Hollywood has been that when Howard Stringer departed as chief executive the pictures group might be put up for sale, a theory that Sony has denied.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - How will Howard Stringer's exit from atop Sony affect its movie and television studio?

headline.main: What the Change at the Top of Sony May Mean for Sony Pictures
